name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Lead Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in high-performance application development across healthcare and financial industries. Expertise in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and **Python**, with strong proficiency in **Microservices**, **CI/CD** pipelines, and cloud platforms including **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. Skilled in **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and implementing Infrastructure as Code for optimizing deployment processes.
Passionate about Agile methodologies and Test-Driven Development (TDD) to ensure high code quality and efficient team collaboration. Proven track record of leading cross-functional teams, fostering communication, and ensuring adherence to project timelines.
Additionally, I have developed AI/ML-powered platforms using **React**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, with a solid foundation in compliance-driven development aligned with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. My background in MLOps encompasses model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

experience.responsibilities:
Led the design and development of full-stack solutions utilizing **Java** and **Spring Boot**, ensuring adherence to Agile methodologies and TDD best practices.
Developed robust microservices architectures to improve application scalability and maintainability, leveraging **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for container orchestration and deployment in cloud environments including **AWS** and **Azure**.
Implemented comprehensive CI/CD pipelines incorporating **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**, achieving a deployment frequency of over **50** releases per month while maintaining high code quality standards.
Mentored and guided a team of software engineers, fostering collaboration and communication to enhance project outcomes and facilitate career development within an Agile framework.
Established Infrastructure as Code (IaC) practices using tools like **Terraform** and **CloudFormation**, enabling consistent and repeatable infrastructure deployment across environments and reducing setup time by **75%**.
Ensured thorough testing practices by integrating automated testing frameworks, improving overall code reliability with a test coverage of **90%** across all services.
Successfully managed cross-functional teams, leading project reviews and facilitating discussions to align technical objectives with business goals, achieving a **20%** increase in project delivery speed.
Actively participated in architectural reviews and design discussions, promoting best practices in code quality and documentation, resulting in improved maintainability and scalability of the codebase.
Utilized **Python** in conjunction with advanced machine learning libraries such as **TensorFlow** and **scikit-learn** to implement features for risk management and fraud detection within financial applications.
Oversaw the deployment of cloud-based applications, enhancing performance and availability through effective monitoring and incident response strategies.

Led the modernization of core financial platforms by implementing microservices architecture using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), resulting in a **30%** increase in system scalability and a **25%** boost in performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Championed the development of interactive front-end applications using **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, with Redux Toolkit and Tailwind CSS, achieving a **40%** improvement in user engagement for financial tools and admin panels.
Designed and deployed real-time analytics dashboards by integrating **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, which provided operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies, enhancing operational efficiency by **35%**.
Implemented a robust event-driven architecture utilizing **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring efficient asynchronous communication for critical workflows including payments, alerts, and compliance efforts.
Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from both internal and third-party sources with **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, enabling both batch and real-time processing capabilities.
Leveraged machine learning technologies like **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML** to build and deploy models for proactive fraud detection, enhancing security by identifying suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns.
Created ML pipelines for real-time applications such as credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, employing **MLflow** and **Airflow** for seamless integration of model inference into backend services.

Led the design and optimization of backend services using **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and **Python** frameworks, ensuring high availability and scalability in a global e-commerce setting with support for **Microservices** architecture.
Managed and coordinated Agile projects with a focus on **DevOps** practices, integrating CI/CD pipelines utilizing **Docker** and **Kubernetes** to streamline deployments and improve code quality.
Implemented **Automated testing frameworks** to enhance the reliability of applications through Test-Driven Development (**TDD**), resulting in a **30%** reduction in production bugs over **6 months**.
Oversaw team management and mentorship, promoting effective communication and collaboration within an Agile team focused on delivering high-quality software solutions.
Leveraged cloud services such as **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** for deploying applications, ensuring robust infrastructure management through **Infrastructure as Code** practices.
Designed modular, efficient microservices for key features, improving application performance metrics by **40%** and supporting up to **100,000** simultaneous users.
Facilitated cross-functional communication, fostering a culture of teamwork and continuous delivery over **2 years**, which increased project delivery speed by **25%**.
Applied best coding practices and conducted code reviews, ensuring adherence to security protocols and enhancing overall code maintainability.
Promoted a culture of learning and development, resulting in a **15%** increase in team productivity through ongoing training and knowledge sharing sessions.
